thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Lies, Damn Lies and Inflation

author: James Mackintosh
title: Lies, Damn Lies and Inflation
text:
Two central banks are responsible for two regions that over the past five years have had similar inflation, similar job creation and similar inflation targets. One, the U.S. Federal Reserve, has raised interest rates six times. The other, the European Central Bank, is expected to increase next year for the first time since its mistake in 2011.
Anyone familiar with the standard market narrative will push back: Inflation has been far lower in Europe, and unemployment far higher, justifying the ECBâ€™s extraordinary monetary measures,...
